title: Geoff Nuttall, First Among Equals in Acclaimed Quartet, Dies at 56
description: With the St. Lawrence Quartet, he played the violin with such enthusiasm that he often swept himself from his seat. At the Spoleto Festival USA, he was a shaping force.
dc:creator: David Allen
media:description: Mr. Nuttall performing this year. He was 10 or 11 when he first played in a quartet.
